name: JACKPOT 2
description:
JACKPOT 2 is a casual game. After starting the game, it has three wheels to turn. When the wheel stops, the icon stopped at the winning line matches the winning pattern, and the player will get the winning amount indicated by the winning pattern.
[Game operation]
Click to operate.
[Rules of the game]
- Select number of lines and lines bet
- Press the Spin button to start game
- You can also use Max Bet button to auto bet
- Pres Auto button to turn Auto Spin game mode
[Game features]
The money used in the game is game currency, not gambling. Players will receive certain game coins every day when they enter the game.
